alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Juneau and southern Adams Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 351 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms across northern Juneau and Adam counties near Necedah moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Friendship and Adams around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include County Roads B And P, Dells Timberland Campground, County Roads B And K, The Town Of Quincy, County Roads G And M, Lyndon Station, Stand Rock Campground, Big Spring, Highway 13 And County E and Lemonweir. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 57 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
